/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their gray and white facades standing out against the blue sky. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
